name: Glucagon
indications: Hypoglycemia < 69mg/dl and symptomatic with no IV access

pedi: [PM2] - 0.1mg/kg max 1mg {IM} repeat every 15 minutes as needed to keep BGL > 60 mg/dl
[TE7] - 0.1mg/kg {IV/IO} {IM} may repeat in 15 minutes if needed
adult: [TE7] - 2-4mg {IV/IO} {IM} may repeat in 15 minutes if needed

pearls: Patients with prolonged hypoglycemia or those who are malnourished may not respond to glucagon.
